languages.text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills an enemy whose {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} is IV or higher, the Bounty Hunter immediately {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon and attacks the closest enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This attack gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} but deals only {uip|DamagePercent|e0dcfc42ff494a7ead8cd3a788ff7516}% of the Bounty Hunter's usual damage.
languages.original_text: Убив противника с {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}рангом{/g} IV или выше, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотник за головами{/g} немедленно {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}перезаряжает{/g} оружие и атакует ближайшего противника в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g}. Эта атака получает +50% к {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}сквозному пробитию{/g}, но наносит только {uip|DamagePercent|e0dcfc42ff494a7ead8cd3a788ff7516}% от обычного урона охотника за головами.

traits.locale_text: Whenever the Hunter kills an enemy whose difficulty tier is IV or higher, the Hunter immediately reloads their weapon and attacks the closest enemy in their line of sight. This attack gains +50% overpenetration but deals only <u>4×(BS bonus+PER bonus)%</u> of the Hunter's usual damage.

Whenever the Hunter kills an enemy whose difficulty tier is IV or higher, the Hunter immediately reloads their weapon and attacks the closest enemy in their line of sight. This attack gains +50% overpenetration but deals only <u>(4 × (BS bonus + PER bonus))</u>% of the Hunter's usual damage.

Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills an enemy whose {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} is IV or higher, the Bounty Hunter immediately {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon and attacks the closest enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This attack gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} but deals only {uip|DamagePercent|e0dcfc42ff494a7ead8cd3a788ff7516}% of the Bounty Hunter's usual damage.

This attack gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}overpenetration{/g} but deals only {uip|DamagePercent|e0dcfc42ff494a7ead8cd3a788ff7516}% of the Hunter's usual damage.

languages.text: Убив противника с {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}рангом{/g} IV или выше, {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}охотник за головами{/g} немедленно {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}перезаряжает{/g} оружие и атакует ближайшего противника в зоне {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}видимости{/g}. Эта атака получает +50% к {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}сквозному пробитию{/g}, но наносит только {uip|DamagePercent|e0dcfc42ff494a7ead8cd3a788ff7516}% от обычного урона охотника за головами.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills an enemy whose {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} is IV or higher, the Bounty Hunter immediately {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon and attacks the closest enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This attack gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} but deals only {uip|DamagePercent|e0dcfc42ff494a7ead8cd3a788ff7516}% of the Bounty Hunter's usual damage.

traits.locale_text: Убив противника со сложностью IV или выше, охотник немедленно перезаряжает оружие и атакует ближайшего противника в зоне видимости. Эта атака получает +50% к сквозному пробитию, но наносит только <u>(4 × (бонус ДБ + бонус ВОС))</u>% от обычного урона охотника.

Убив противника со сложностью IV или выше, охотник немедленно перезаряжает оружие и атакует ближайшего противника в зоне видимости. Эта атака получает +50% к сквозному пробитию, но наносит только <u>(4 × (бонус ДБ + бонус ВОС))</u>% от обычного урона охотника.

Убив противника с {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}рангом{/g} IV или выше, охотник немедленно {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}перезаряжает{/g} оружие и атакует ближайшего противника в {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}зоне видимости{/g}. Эта атака получает +50% к {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}сквозному пробитию{/g}, но наносит только {uip|DamagePercent|e0dcfc42ff494a7ead8cd3a788ff7516}% от обычного урона охотника.

languages.text: 每当{g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}赏金猎人{/g}击杀{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}为IV或更高的敌人时，赏金猎人会立刻重新{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}装填武器{/g}，并攻击{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}内最近的敌人。此次攻击获得+50%{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}过度穿透{/g}，但造成的{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}伤害{/g}仅为赏金猎人常规伤害的{uip|DamagePercent|e0dcfc42ff494a7ead8cd3a788ff7516}%。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills an enemy whose {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} is IV or higher, the Bounty Hunter immediately {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon and attacks the closest enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This attack gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} but deals only {uip|DamagePercent|e0dcfc42ff494a7ead8cd3a788ff7516}% of the Bounty Hunter's usual {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: 每当猎人击杀{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}为IV或更高的敌人时，猎人会立即{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}重新装填{/g}武器，并攻击{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}内最近的敌人。此次攻击获得+50%{g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}过度穿透{/g}，但造成的伤害仅为猎人常规伤害的<u>（4×（{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}弹道技能{/g}加值+{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}感知{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}））</u>%。

每当猎人击杀{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}难度等级{/g}为IV或更高的敌人时，猎人会立即{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}重新装填{/g}武器，并攻击{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}视线{/g}内最近的敌人。此次攻击获得+50%{g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}过度穿透{/g}，但造成的伤害仅为猎人常规伤害的{uip|DamagePercent|e0dcfc42ff494a7ead8cd3a788ff7516}%。

languages.text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} mata a un enemigo con un {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} de IV o más, el cazarrecompensas {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recarga{/g} inmediatamente su arma y ataca al enemigo más próximo dentro de su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g}. Este ataque gana un +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}sobrepenetración{/g}, pero solo inflige un {uip|DamagePercent|e0dcfc42ff494a7ead8cd3a788ff7516} % del {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que causa habitualmente el cazarrecompensas.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills an enemy whose {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} is IV or higher, the Bounty Hunter immediately {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon and attacks the closest enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This attack gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} but deals only {uip|DamagePercent|e0dcfc42ff494a7ead8cd3a788ff7516}% of the Bounty Hunter's usual {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Cada vez que el {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}cazarrecompensas{/g} mata a un enemigo con un {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} de IV o más, el cazarrecompensas {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recarga{/g} inmediatamente su arma y ataca al enemigo más próximo dentro de su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g}. Este ataque gana un +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}sobrepenetración{/g}, pero solo inflige un {uip|DamagePercent|e0dcfc42ff494a7ead8cd3a788ff7516} % del {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}daño{/g} que causa habitualmente el cazarrecompensas.

Cada vez que el cazador mata a un enemigo con un {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}nivel de desafío{/g} de IV o más, el cazador {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recarga{/g} inmediatamente su arma y ataca al enemigo más próximo dentro de su {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}línea de visión{/g}. Este ataque gana un +50 % de {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}sobrepenetración{/g}, pero solo inflige un {uip|DamagePercent|e0dcfc42ff494a7ead8cd3a788ff7516} % del daño que causa habitualmente el cazador.

languages.text: Immer wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} einen Feind tötet, dessen {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} IV oder höher ist, {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}lädt{/g} der Kopfgeldjäger sofort seine Waffe nach und greift den nächstgelegenen Feind in seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} an. Dieser Angriff erhält +50 % {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}Überdurchdringung{/g}, verursacht aber nur {uip|DamagePercent|e0dcfc42ff494a7ead8cd3a788ff7516} % des üblichen Schadens des Kopfgeldjägers.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills an enemy whose {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} is IV or higher, the Bounty Hunter immediately {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon and attacks the closest enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This attack gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} but deals only {uip|DamagePercent|e0dcfc42ff494a7ead8cd3a788ff7516}% of the Bounty Hunter's usual damage.

traits.locale_text: Immer wenn der {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Kopfgeldjäger{/g} einen Feind tötet, dessen {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsstufe{/g} IV oder höher ist, {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}lädt{/g} der Kopfgeldjäger sofort seine Waffe nach und greift den nächstgelegenen Feind in seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} an. Dieser Angriff erhält +50 % {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}Überdurchdringung{/g}, verursacht aber nur {uip|DamagePercent|e0dcfc42ff494a7ead8cd3a788ff7516} % des üblichen {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}Schadens{/g} des Kopfgeldjägers.

Immer wenn der Jäger einen Gegner tötet, dessen {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}Schwierigkeitsgrad{/g} IV oder höher ist, {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}lädt der Jäger sofort seine Waffe nach{/g} und greift den nächstgelegenen Gegner in seiner {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}Sichtlinie{/g} an. Dieser Angriff erhält +50% {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}Überdurchdringung{/g}, verursacht aber nur {uip|DamagePercent|e0dcfc42ff494a7ead8cd3a788ff7516}% des üblichen Schadens des Jägers.

languages.text: Chaque fois que le {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}chasseur de primes{/g} élimine un ennemi dont le {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} est supérieur ou égal à IV, il {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recharge{/g} immédiatement son arme et attaque l'ennemi le plus proche visible dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}. Cette attaque bénéficie d'une {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}surpénétration{/g} de +50 % mais n'inflige que {uip|DamagePercent|e0dcfc42ff494a7ead8cd3a788ff7516} % des {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}dégâts{/g} habituels du chasseur de primes.
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills an enemy whose {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} is IV or higher, the Bounty Hunter immediately {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon and attacks the closest enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This attack gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} but deals only {uip|DamagePercent|e0dcfc42ff494a7ead8cd3a788ff7516}% of the Bounty Hunter's usual {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: Lorsque le Chasseur élimine un ennemi dont le {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} est supérieur ou égal à IV, il {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recharge{/g} immédiatement son arme et attaque l'ennemi le plus proche visible dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}. Cette attaque bénéficie d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}surpénétration{/g} de +50 % mais n'inflige que <u>(4 × (bonus de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}CB{/g} + {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g}))</u> % des dégâts habituels du Chasseur.

Lorsque le Chasseur élimine un ennemi dont le {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}niveau de difficulté{/g} est supérieur ou égal à IV, il {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}recharge{/g} immédiatement son arme et attaque l'ennemi le plus proche visible dans sa {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}ligne de mire{/g}. Cette attaque bénéficie d'une {g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}surpénétration{/g} de +50 % mais n'inflige que {uip|DamagePercent|e0dcfc42ff494a7ead8cd3a788ff7516} % des dégâts habituels du Chasseur.

languages.text: {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}バウンティハンター{/g}が{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g}IV以上の敵を倒した時、即座に武器を{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}リロード{/g}し、{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界内{/g}の最も近くの敵を攻撃する。この攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}過貫通{/g}が+50%されるが、バウンティハンターの{g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}通常ダメージ{/g}の{uip|DamagePercent|e0dcfc42ff494a7ead8cd3a788ff7516}%しか与えられない。
languages.original_text: Whenever the {g|Encyclopedia:CareerHunterGlossary}Bounty Hunter{/g} kills an enemy whose {g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}difficulty tier{/g} is IV or higher, the Bounty Hunter immediately {g|Encyclopedia:Reload}reloads{/g} their weapon and attacks the closest enemy in their {g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}line of sight{/g}. This attack gains +50% {g|Encyclopedia:OverpenetrationFullGlossary}overpenetration{/g} but deals only {uip|DamagePercent|e0dcfc42ff494a7ead8cd3a788ff7516}% of the Bounty Hunter's usual {g|Encyclopedia:DamageGlossary}damage{/g}.

traits.locale_text: ハンターが{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g}IV以上の敵を倒した時、即座に武器を{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}リロード{/g}し、{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界{/g}内の最も近くの敵を攻撃する。この攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}過貫通{/g}が+50%されるが、ハンターの通常ダメージの<u>(4 × ({g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerBallisticSkill}BS{/g} ボーナス + {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerPerception}PER{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}))</u>%しか与えられない。

ハンターが{g|Encyclopedia:DifficultyTier}脅威度{/g}IV以上の敵を倒した時、即座に武器を{g|Encyclopedia:Reload}リロード{/g}し、{g|Encyclopedia:LineOfSight}視界{/g}内の最も近くの敵を攻撃する。この攻撃は{g|Encyclopedia:Overpenetration}過貫通{/g}が+50%されるが、ハンターの通常ダメージの{uip|DamagePercent|e0dcfc42ff494a7ead8cd3a788ff7516}%しか与えられない。
